docs.title: Exercise Routines
docs.text: • TODO: unclear what the typical week should look like

docs.title: 1 Strength training
docs.text:
You must exert each muscle 8 times in a week.

Match with Fartlek training.

docs.title: 1.1 Full body - light
docs.text:
Total body exercises - light.

  • Fierce full body HIIT - 30m

docs.title: 1.2 Full body - heavy
docs.text:
Total body exercises - with weights, to go deeper into the muscle groups. Use loose weights rather than machines.

  • TODO: course online querci on these exercises?

docs.title: 2 Breath alignment
docs.text: The aim here is to re-sync signals from brain / heart / diaphram (breathing).

docs.title: 2.1 Fartlek / High Intensity Intervals
docs.text:
• 20 min of Fartlek training at VO2 max
  • Match with Total Body training days

docs.title: 2.2 Aerobic Low impact
docs.text: • 1h of slow running / swimming

docs.title: 3 Mental Training
docs.text:
• Go out of comfort zone doing activities that require concentration
  • Focus on concentration training and doing things with full attention

Current plan:

  • learn Chinese
  • complete courses from Querci

docs.title: 07.00 - 08.00: Breakfast
docs.text: Cadence Item Quantity Every meal Melcalin Base 3 tablets Noci 30g Te non zuccherato 1 cup Alternate Oats 45g Pane integr. frumento 80g Pane integr. segale 80g Alternate Honey 3 tea spn. Jam 3 tea spn. Alternate Yoghurt 90g Soy Drink 200ml Alternate Fresh Cheese 100g Eggs 1 egg

docs.title: 10.00 - 11.00 : Snack
docs.text: Cadence Item Quantity Every meal Mixed fruits 250g Parmiggiano 50g

docs.title: 12.00 - 13.00: Lunch
docs.text: Cadence Item Quantity Every meal Extra v olive oil 1-2 spn Alternate Mixed salad (no carrot, maize, potato) 80g Mixed cooked vedgetables 200g Alternate Riso integrale 80g Pasta grano duro 80g Patate 150g Hummus 150g Pane integrale di frumento 40g Pane integrale di segale 40g Alternate Carne di manzo 100g Legumi 110g Pesce 110g Carni bianche 75g Formaggi freschi 75g

docs.title: 15.00 - 16.00 : Snack
docs.text: Cadence Item Quantity Every meal Mixed fruits 150g Melcalin VProtein 5 compresse

docs.title: 19.00 - 20.00 : Dinner
docs.text: Cadence Item Quantity Every meal Melcalin Pralbumina 2 misurini Olio extravergine 1-2 cucchiai Alternate Zuppa di verdura (no pasta, no legumi) 250g Insalata mista (no carote, mais, patate) 80g Verdure cotte miste 200g Alternate Carne bianca 100g Pesce 150g Uova 1 uovo

docs.title: 21.00 - 22.00 : Integration
docs.text: Item Quantity Melcalin HOPs 2 capsules Melcalin Nimet 1 capsules

docs.title: General meal protocol
docs.text:
This is the protocol to follow during meals:

  1. eat slowly, with good attention to what you're eating
  2. chew properly and deeply
  3. don't exaggerate with food (abbuffarsi)
  4. relax after meals, don't go to work / behind screens immediately after
  5. relax during meal - no stressful environment / pace / timing

docs.title: Eating out
docs.text:
• No alcohol
  • Tell people you do not eat late and have light meals, hence order just a salad
  • Do not give in to eating late

docs.title: Rules for integrating food after sports
Gym Session
docs.text:
• Fruits before session
  • Proteins immediately after

docs.title: Aerobic exercise (evening)
docs.text: • can add some rice / bread at dinner
